languages.text: {n}Кибелла замирает — а затем, словно приняв какое-то решение, прячет взгляд и уверенно кивает.{/n} "Твои попреки справедливы. Потому я должна отступиться от тебя. Все, что мешает идти нитью Паутины, будет истреблено в моем сердце и разуме. Благодарю, что указал{mf||а} на решение, Домин'{name}". {n}Кибелла кланяется и направляется прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла замирает — а затем, словно приняв какое-то решение, уверенно кивает, пряча при этом взгляд.{/n} "Твои попреки справедливы. Потому я должна отступиться от тебя. Все, что мешает мне идти стезей Анн'Шини, будет истреблено в моем сердце и разуме. Благодарю тебя, что указал{mf||а} мне на решение, Эним'{name}". {n}Кибелла кланяется вам и направляется прочь из палат.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла замирает — а затем, словно приняв какое-то решение, прячет взгляд и уверенно кивает.{/n} "Твои попреки справедливы. Потому я должна отступиться от тебя. Все, что мешает идти нитью Паутины, будет истреблено в моем сердце и разуме. Благодарю, что указал{mf||а} на решение, Домин'{name}". {n}Кибелла кланяется и направляется прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if having come to a decision, looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. All that is preventing me from following the way of Ahn'shini will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Enim'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

{n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if having come to a decision, looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. All that is preventing me from following the way of Ahn'shini will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Enim'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

Everything that is preventing me from following the way of Ahn'shini will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Enim'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

{n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the way of Ahn'shini will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Enim'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

{n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

{n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah erstarrt ... und dann, als würde sie zu einer Entscheidung gelangen, wendet sie sich nickend ab.{/n} "Euer Tadel ist gerechtfertigt. Und deshalb muss ich Euch gehen lassen. Alles, was mich abhält, dem Faden des Netzes zu folgen, wird aus meinem Herzen und meinem Verstand geschnitten. Danke, dass Ihr mich auf die Lösung hingewiesen habt, Domin'{name}." {n}Sie verneigt sich und geht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah erstarrt ... und dann, als würde sie zu einer Entscheidung gelangen, wendet sie sich nickend ab.{/n} "Euer Tadel ist gerechtfertigt. Und deshalb muss ich Euch gehen lassen. Alles, was mich abhält, dem Faden des Netzes zu folgen, wird aus meinem Herzen und meinem Verstand geschnitten. Danke, dass Ihr mich auf die Lösung hingewiesen habt, Domin'{name}." {n}Sie verneigt sich und geht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se queda inmóvil... y, después, como si hubiera tomado una decisión, aparta la mirada y asiente con firmeza.{/n} «Su castigo es justo, y por eso debo dejar que se marche. Todo lo que me impide seguir los hilos de la Red quedará apartado de mi corazón y de mi mente. Gracias por llevarme a la solución, Domin'{name}». {n}Hace una reverencia y se aleja.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se queda inmóvil... y, después, como si hubiera tomado una decisión, aparta la mirada y asiente con firmeza.{/n} «Su castigo es justo, y por eso debo dejar que se marche. Todo lo que me impide seguir los hilos de la Red quedará apartado de mi corazón y de mi mente. Gracias por llevarme a la solución, Domin'{name}». {n}Hace una reverencia y se aleja.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キベラは、ぴたりと動きを止め…そして決意するかのように目をそらし、しっかりとうなずく。{/n}「あなたの非難はもっともよ。だからこそ、私はあなたを手放さなくては。ウェブの糸をたどることを妨げるものはすべて、私の心と体から取り除かれる。解決策を示してくれてありがとう、ドミン・{name}」{n}彼女は一礼して立ち去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、ぴたりと動きを止め…そして決意するかのように目をそらし、しっかりとうなずく。{/n}「あなたの非難はもっともよ。だからこそ、私はあなたを手放さなくては。ウェブの糸をたどることを妨げるものはすべて、私の心と体から取り除かれる。解決策を示してくれてありがとう、ドミン・{name}」{n}彼女は一礼して立ち去った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈僵在那里，一动不动……随后，她移开了视线，坚定地点了点头，仿佛下定了决心一般。{/n}“你的责备很有道理，正因如此，我必须放手让你离开。一切阻碍我遵循教义的事物，都必须从我的心灵与思想中彻底抹除。感谢你为我找到了解决方法，秘者{name}。”{n}她鞠了一躬，走开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈僵在那里，一动不动……随后，她移开了视线，坚定地点了点头，仿佛下定了决心一般。{/n}“你的责备很有道理，正因如此，我必须放手让你离开。一切阻碍我遵循教义的事物，都必须从我的心灵与思想中彻底抹除。感谢你为我找到了解决方法，秘者{name}。”{n}她鞠了一躬，走开了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se fige... puis finit par se détourner et hocher la tête, comme si elle était parvenue à une décision.{/n} « Votre reproche est justifié. C'est pourquoi je dois vous laisser partir. Ainsi, tout ce qui m'empêche de suivre les fils de la Toile sera excisé de mon cœur et de mon esprit. Merci de m'avoir montré la bonne solution, Domin'{name}. » {n}Elle s'incline et quitte la pièce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se fige... puis finit par se détourner et hocher la tête, comme si elle était parvenue à une décision.{/n} « Votre reproche est justifié. C'est pourquoi je dois vous laisser partir. Ainsi, tout ce qui m'empêche de suivre les fils de la Toile sera excisé de mon cœur et de mon esprit. Merci de m'avoir montré la bonne solution, Domin'{name}. » {n}Elle s'incline et quitte la pièce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, bir süre sabit kalıyor. Ardından bir karara varmışçasına bakışlarını çevirip kararlı bir şekilde başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Adil bir sitem. İşte bu nedenle seni bırakmam gerekiyor. Böylece Ağ'ın ipliğini takip etmemi engelleyen her şeyi hem yüreğimden hem de zihnimden kesip atabilirim. Beni çözüme yönlendirdiğin için teşekkür ederim Domin'{name}." {n}Başını eğerek uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah goes still... and then, as if coming to a decision, she looks away and nods firmly.{/n} "Your reproach is just. And that is why I must let you go. Everything that is preventing me from following the thread of the Web will be excised from my heart and mind. Thank you for pointing me toward the solution, Domin'{name}." {n}She bows and walks away.{/n}
